attributes.action: All MP’s to live under the highest Covid Tier restrictions being faced by voters
attributes.additional_details:
Asking people to not do what is part of their lives is hard, it effects mental health and the burden should be shouldered by the people making the rules, which we cannot vote on. I understand that some parts of the role of MP will need to deviate a little from this to do the job. I.e travelling out of the area. 
So we need to stop this north south us them attitude. I think this will give the correct message to the public.
attributes.background: Vote that MP’s should be leading by example, so to drive compliance with the public , and to show they are working with all of the country, whilst any area is under Tier 3, All MP’s should work and live under those rules. Then drop to tier 2 and then tier 1

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Local restrictions apply to local areas rather than specific people or jobs, which are covered by the Government's Covid-Secure guidance.
